data.description:
Imagine if you could be instantly transported to a magical, calming world. 

üé∂ üèùÔ∏è A place where you could let go of everyday stresses and be soothed by relaxing visuals, tactile sensations and gentle sounds.

NOW YOU CAN!

üí° Inspired by the many hundreds of real-life Sensory Rooms in the world, Your VR Therapy now makes it possible to experience these important relaxation facilities virtually.

And for a tiny fraction of the cost.

**WHAT ARE SENSORY ROOMS?**
These are widely used to help people with stress issues and learning difficulties. They offer a safe space to unwind and engage in gently stimulating activities.

**OUR VIRTUAL SENSORY ROOM **
From the comfort of your home, you can now enter a realm of relaxation and sensory exploration ‚Äì instantly. 

Created in collaboration with trained Sensory Room experts, our space offers:

‚Äì CALMING VISUALS -- 

‚Äì SOOTHING SOUNDS ‚Äì

‚Äì INTERACTIVE OBJECTS ‚Äì

Which all help to promote comfort and self-discovery.

This virtual oasis has been developed for both adults and their family members in need of some safe, relaxing 'me' time.

It offers a rare opportunity to step away from the stresses of everyday life.

Our highly interactive app:
- Enables you to let off steam in a secure, controlled environment.
- Promotes individual play and discovery.
- Is designed by experts to enhance emotional development.
- Requires no travel to a physical location.

START YOUR RELAXATION TODAY!
